Show IngrendientsShow All Steps

Estimated Time: 29 Minutes

Recipe:

Put 1 cup brown rice in instant pot
Put in 1½ cups water
Pressure cook on high pressure for 15 minutes, (Preheat takes 9 min) (Takes 24 minutes)
Let instant pot sit without opening steam valve (Takes 5 minutes)
Open steam valve
FINISHED
Put inner instant pot liner on stove
